name: Alertness, Mythic

sections.body: The bonus on Perception and Sense Motive skill checks from Alertness increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Perception or Sense Motive check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your powers of perception surpass everyone's, whether used to observe your surroundings or the intentions of others.
